revision.text:
<languages/> ==Be respectful== You must respect all users, regardless of your liking towards them. Treat others the way you want to be treated.
==Keep swearing to a minimum== The use of profanity should be kept to a minimum. However, any derogatory language towards any user is prohibited.
==Keep on topic== All pages must contain relevant and accurate information
==No cheating chat== Do not make pages about cheats for the game.
==No Spamming== Don't send a lot of small messages right after each other.
==No pornographic/adult/other NSFW material== This is a community wiki and not meant to share this kind of material.
revision.comment: Updating to match new version of source page
